p: Ziziphora Clinopodioides leaves (100 g) were shade dried at room temperature (25±2°C). Samples were hydrodis-tilled using a Clevenger-type apparatus for 3.5 h till full of essential oil. Then, supernatant was collected and dried with 0.5 g anhydrous sodium sulfate (Merck, Darmstadt, Germany). The essential oil was stored in a dark glass bottle, and covered with aluminum foil at 4±1°C ( Shahbazi, 2015).
